comp_req__rust_containers__det_behavior.content: The Containers library shall provide deterministic behavior.
comp_req__rust_containers__det_behavior.title: Deterministic Behavior

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_btree.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide a heap-allocated B-Tree container with construction-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_btree.title: Fixed-Capacity B-Tree

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_hashmap.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide a heap-allocated hashmap container with construction-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_hashmap.title: Fixed-Capacity Hashmap

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_hashset.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide a heap-allocated hashset container with construction-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_hashset.title: Fixed-Capacity Hashset

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_no_real.content: Fixed-capacity containers shall never allocate or re-allocate memory after their initial construction.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_no_real.title: No Reallocation

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_queue.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide a heap-allocated double-ended queue container with construction-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_queue.title: Fixed-Capacity Queue

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_string.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide a heap-allocated string data type with construction-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_string.title: Fixed-Capacity String

comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_vector.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide a heap-allocated vector container with construction-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__fixed_vector.title: Fixed-Capacity Vector

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_btree.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide an inline-storage B-Tree container with compile-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_btree.title: Inline-Storage B-Tree

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_hashma.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide an inline-storage hashmap container with compile-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_hashma.title: Inline-Storage Hashmap

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_hashse.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide an inline-storage hashset container with compile-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_hashse.title: Inline-Storage Hashset

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_no_hea.content: Inline-storage containers shall never allocate heap memory.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_no_hea.title: No Heap Allocation

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_queue.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide an inline-storage double-ended queue container with compile-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_queue.title: Inline-Storage Queue

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_string.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide an inline-storage string data type with compile-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_string.title: Inline-Storage String

comp_req__rust_containers__inline_vector.content: The Rust Containers library shall provide an inline-storage vector container with compile-time capacity specification.
comp_req__rust_containers__inline_vector.title: Inline-Storage Vector

comp_req__rust_containers__type_safety.content: The Rust Containers library shall enforce compile-time type safety for all container operations.
comp_req__rust_containers__type_safety.title: Type Safety

doc__baselibs_rust_safety_package_fdr.title: Rust Base Libraries Safety Package Formal Review

doc__baselibs_rust_safety_plan_fdr.title: Rust Base Libraries Safety Plan Formal Review

feat_req__baselibs_rust__abi_containers.content: The Rust base libraries shall provide a library of containers that can serve as the basis for ABI-compatible container data structures.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__abi_containers.title: ABI-Compatible Containers

feat_req__baselibs_rust__consistent_apis.content: The Rust base libraries shall provide consistent APIs while respecting language-specific idioms.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__consistent_apis.title: Consistent APIs

feat_req__baselibs_rust__containers_libr.content: The Rust base libraries shall provide a library of container types that serve the specific needs of SW-platform components.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__containers_libr.title: Container Library

feat_req__baselibs_rust__core_utilities.content: The Rust base libraries shall include core software utilities and common infrastructure components needed by multiple platform modules.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__core_utilities.title: Core Software Utilities

feat_req__baselibs_rust__maintainable_de.content: The Rust base libraries shall be designed for maintainability and code reuse.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__maintainable_de.title: Maintainable Design

feat_req__baselibs_rust__result_library.content:
The Rust base libraries shall provide error handling mechanisms that enable development without relying on Rust panics.
Where an idiomatic interface requires panics, an additional non-panicking option shall be provided as well.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__result_library.title: Panic-Free Development Support

feat_req__baselibs_rust__safety.content: The Rust base libraries shall implement functionality necessary to support safety-relevant platform components up to ASIL-B for selected functionalities.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__safety.title: Safety Relevance

feat_req__baselibs_rust__security.content: The Rust base libraries shall adhere to secure coding standards to prevent vulnerabilities across platform components.
feat_req__baselibs_rust__security.title: Security Robustness

arch.description: Mapping of uml key to uml content.

constraints.description: List of constraint names, which are defined for this need.

constraints_error.description: An error message set if any constraint failed, and `error_message` field is set in config.

constraints_passed.description: True if all constraints passed, False if any failed, None if not yet checked.

constraints_results.description: Mapping of constraint name, to check name, to result.

docname.description: Name of the document where the need is defined (None if external).

doctype.description: Type of the document where the need is defined, e.g. '.rst'.

external_css.description: CSS class name, added to the external reference.

external_url.description: URL of the need, if it is an external need.

has_dead_links.description: True if any links reference need ids that are not found in the need list.

has_forbidden_dead_links.description: True if any links reference need ids that are not found in the need list, and the link type does not allow dead links.

is_external.description: If true, no node is created and need is referencing external url.

is_modified.description: Whether the need was modified by needextend.

is_need.description: Whether the need is a need.

is_part.description: Whether the need is a part.

jinja_content.description: Whether the content should be pre-processed by jinja.

layout.description: Key of the layout, which is used to render the need.

lineno.description: Line number where the need is defined (None if external).

parts.description: Mapping of parts, a.k.a. sub-needs, IDs to data that overrides the need's data

signature.description: Derived from a docutils desc_name node.

style.description: Comma-separated list of CSS classes (all appended by `needs_style_`).
